function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Contagious diseases may spread through imported products and services","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and outbreak in European importers and their communities","Mitigation":"Implement stringent health and safety measures for imported products and services, and strengthen border control and quarantine procedures","Technologies":"Advanced screening and testing technologies for early detection of contagious diseases","People":"European importers, their employees, and local communities","Owner":"European importers, government health authorities, and international health organizations"},{"Description":"Public funding for EGD initiatives may not prioritize health and safety measures to prevent disease transmission","Impact":"Greater risk of disease outbreak in communities due to lack of funding for preventative measures","Mitigation":"Advocate for allocation of funding for health and safety measures within EGD initiatives, and ensure proper oversight of funding utilization","Technologies":"Health surveillance systems, tracking and monitoring technologies for disease control","People":"Public health authorities, healthcare workers, and communities","Owner":"European Commission, public health authorities, and international health organizations"},{"Description":"Inadequate investment in green initiatives may lead to environmental conditions that increase disease transmission","Impact":"Environmental degradation and climate change may contribute to the spread of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Encourage investment in green initiatives to mitigate environmental degradation and reduce disease transmission risks","Technologies":"Renewable energy technologies, sustainable infrastructure, and environmental monitoring systems","People":"Global population at risk of environmental health impacts","Owner":"Environmental organizations, policymakers, and international sustainability initiatives"}]}
